full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS MNGON PA'I MDZOD RTZA BA'I TSIG 'GREL ZIN THO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @101B (CES CHOS MNGON PA'I MDZOD RTZA BA'I TSIG 'GREL LTA BUR BRIS PA 'DI NI, KHU RE CHEN MO'I DKA' BCU'I MING TZAM 'CHANG BA BLO BZANG 'CHI MED RDO RJE'I MING CAN GYIS RANG GI ZIN THOR BKOD NAS 'CHANG BA LAS, DUS PHYIS SLOB GNYER BA DPYOD LDAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS MTHONG NAS 'DI LA MCHOD BRJOD SMRAS BSHAD TSANG BAR BYAS NA LEGS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS 'GO MJUG TSANG BAR BYAS PA LAGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,) AOm SVA STI LEGS BSHAD CHOS MNGON MDZOD CES GRAGS PA'I GTAM, ,'PHAGS DANG BSIL RI'I KHOR YUG KHYON 'DIR SNYAN, ,'JAM MGON YAB SRAS RJES 'BRANG SLOB TSIGS KYI, ,THUGS SMON NYID @102A *, ,LAS DAR ZHING RGYAS PA LA, ,DE LTAR SGRUB LA THOGS MED MTHU LDAN PA'I, ,MYUR MDZAD MGON DANG LAS BYI GSHIN RJE'I RGYAL, ,'DOD KHAMS BDAG MO NGAL BSOS PO LA SOGS, ,RNAM BZHI'I 'PHRIN LAS GA-YEL MED SKYONG GYUR CIG , ,,DGE MTSAN PHUN TSOGS BKRA SHIS GA-+YANG CHAGS PA'I, ,MGON GNAS DGA' LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING MCHOG 'DIR, CHOS SBYIN MI ZAD DAR ZHING SPEL BA'I SLAD, ,LEGS PAR PAR DU BSGRUBS SO DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
author_simple: BLO BZANG 'CHI MED RDO RJE'I MING CAN,
